snippet: NEWMAN--Elle, died peacefully on May 28th. Loving mother of Hilary and Robin and their husbands Stuart and Michael, grandmother to Zoe and Noah, sister to John and his wife Nancy, cousin of Howard and Barbara, aunt of Stephanie and her husband Chris and daughter Samantha, aunt to Matthieu and his wife Jen. A service will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th St., on Tuesday, May 31st, at 2pm. Donations in Elle's name can be made to Dorot, 171 West 85th St., NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: NEWMAN--Elle, died peacefully on May 28th. Loving mother of Hilary and Robin and their husbands Stuart and Michael, grandmother to Zoe and Noah, sister to John and his wife Nancy, cousin of Howard and Barbara, aunt of Stephanie and her husband Chris and daughter Samantha, aunt to Matthieu and his wife Jen. A service will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th St., on Tuesday, May 31st, at 2pm. Donations in Elle's name can be made to Dorot, 171 West 85th St., NY. 1/3
